rukus.text: 54|41|Hontōni firuaun no ichizoku ni mo keikoku-sha ga tsukawasa reta.
54|42|(Daga) ware no shuju no shirushi o kyogidearu to shita. Sorede ware wa, idaide kyōryokuna mono no 一摑 Mi de, kare-ra o toraeta.
54|43|Anata gata fushinjin-sha (kuraishu-zoku) no kata ga, korera no mono yori mo sugurete iru no ka. Soretomo Keisuke no naka ni anata gata no tame no shamen ga aru no ka.
54|44|Soretomo kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa mina shōri o eru monodesu.' To demo iu no ka.
54|45|Yagate korera no hitobito wa yabure sari, nige sarudearou.
54|46|Iya (shinpan no)-ji wa, kare-ra ni yakusoku sa reta kigendearu. Shikamo sono tokiniha, mottomo nagekawashī mottomo kurushī me ni audearou.
54|47|Hontōni korera no tsumi o okashite iru-sha-tachi wa, meimō to chōbatsu no uchi ni aru.
54|48|Hi no naka ni kao o shita ni shite hikizura reru sonohi, kare-ra wa,`mōka no fure guai o ajiwai nasai.'(To iwa reyou).
54|49|Hontōni ware wa subete no jibutsu o, kichinto hakatte sōzō shita.
54|50|Mata waga meirei wa tada hitokoto, Shun no yōna monodearu.
54|51|Ware wa kore made, anata gata (makka no tashinkyō to) no dōrui o horoboshita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|52|Kare-ra no shogyō wa, shosatsu ni subete kiroku sa rete iru.
54|53|Daishō subete no koto ga, hitoshiku kakitome rarete iru.
54|54|Hontōni omo o osoreru mono wa,-en to kawa no aru,
54|55|zen'nō no ōja no omoto no, shinri no za ni (sumu nodearu).
